channel.description: Recent content in projects on Thieu's Blog

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects Open-source libraries 1. MEALPY A collection of the state-of-the-art MEta-heuristics ALgorithms in PYthon (mealpy) Currently, more than 70 metaheuristic algorithms in this library. Link: Source Code 2. OPFUNU A collection of Benchmark functions for numerical optimization problems. Framework of OPtimization FUnction in NUmpy (opfunu) Currently, there are several CEC functions (2005/2008/2010/2013/2014/2015) Link: Source Code 3. PERMETRICS A framework of PERformance METRICS (PerMetrics) for artificial intelligence models Currently, there are 20 metrics for Regression problems.
